description:
Kazuma has been thrust into a fantasy world, and most take the “loquat” to the fires of a volcano and destroy it before the evil Snowza can use it to take over the world! This sounds an awful lot like a certain story about a ring…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est ma destinée ! Le Seigneur des Nèfles !
Is This My Path to Take!? The Lord of the Loquat!
Kore ga Watashi no Susumu Michi!? Lord of the Biwa!
นี่คือหนทางที่เราเลือกเดิน!? Lord of the บิวะ
これが私の進む道!? ロード・オブ・ザ・ビワ!
